picked_headlines.summary: Litespark enhances LLM training efficiency, reducing energy use.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is crucial for both engineers and management as it addresses energy efficiency in AI, a key concern for sustainable tech development.

picked_headlines.summary: SBP-YOLO detects road anomalies, enhancing vehicle systems.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights an engineering breakthrough in real-time road safety, relevant for product development and stakeholder interest.

digest:
- *Litespark* offers a framework for efficient LLM training, reducing energy use significantly: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.02483
- *SBP-YOLO* enhances vehicle suspension systems with real-time road anomaly detection: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.01339
- *MarketSenseAI 2.0* improves stock analysis accuracy using LLMs: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.00415
- *CHORD* optimizes on-device recommendation models, reducing retraining costs: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03038
- *MobiLLM* enhances 6G O-RAN security with AI-driven threat mitigation: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.21634
- *ZeroShotOpt* introduces efficient black-box optimization models: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03051
- *CLARITY* AI platform outperforms humans in healthcare triage: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.02463
- *Primus* offers open-source datasets for cybersecurity LLM training: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.11191
- *AutoMaAS* optimizes multi-agent systems using self-evolving frameworks: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.02669
- *HALO* accelerates low-batch LLM inference with a memory-centric design: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.02675
